mapper.select: select id, title, content, first_picture, description, flag, views, appreciation, share_statement, commentable, recommend, published, create_time, update_time, type_id, user_id from t_blog where t_blog.id = #{id}

select id, title, content, first_picture, description, flag, views, appreciation, share_statement, commentable, recommend, published, create_time, update_time, type_id, user_id from t_blog where t_blog.id = #{id}
select * from blog.t_blog where published = true order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into t_blog(title, content, first_picture, description, flag, views, appreciation, share_statement, commentable, published, recommend, type_id, user_id) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{firstPicture}, #{description}, #{flag}, #{views}, #{appreciation}, #{shareStatement}, #{commentable}, #{published}, #{recommend}, #{type.id}, #{user.id});
mapper.update: update t_blog set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, first_picture=#{firstPicture}, description=#{description}, flag = #{flag}, appreciation=#{appreciation}, share_statement=#{shareStatement}, commentable=#{commentable}, published=#{published}, recommend=#{recommend}, update_time=#{updateTime}, type_id=#{type.id}, user_id=#{user.id} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select * from t_blog order by views desc limit 0,#{size}
select * from t_blog order by create_time desc limit 0,#{size}
select * from t_blog where recommend = true order by create_time desc limit 0,#{size}
select * from t_blog where published = true and (title like concat('%', #{query}, '%') or (description like concat('%', #{query}, '%') and content like concat('%', #{query}, '%')))
